dct_title_s: Philips' smaller school room map of the world
dct_description_sm: George Philip & Son, Ltd. North Decimal Degree 90.000000. South Decimal Degree -90.0000. East Decimal Degree 180.0000. West Decimal Degree -160.0000. Gall's stereographic projection. Dependent areas and country sphere of influence are color indicated. Shipping routes and railways are indicated; "The width of the shipping routes corresponds to the value of the merchandise carried.".
